entry.title: Lollipop Bath Salt
entry.summary:
Vendor: Dirty Bee
Type: Bath Salt
Price: 5.99

Dirty Bee | Bath Salts 4oz

Mixture of all scents

Dirty Bee’s Bath Salt is the perfect ingredient to a warm relaxing bath.  Before getting in the tub, pour a little in your tub and watch the magic happen as the color fills the water (don’t you worry, it won’t stain that pretty white) to release a relaxing aroma that will surely fill the air to take your troubles away.    

We use only the VERY best, 100% American, ingredients.  When it comes to our skin, we don’t take any shortcuts to offer products that you and your entire family will enjoy for years to come. 

Ingredients: Sodium Chloride (Common Salt), Dendritic Salt, Dead Sea Salt, Magnesium Sulfate (Epsom Salt), Fragrance, Color (May Include: Red #40 Alum Lake, Red #33 Lake, Chromium Hydroxide Green, Yellow #6 Lake High Dye, Yellow #5 Lake, Blue #1 Alum Lake)

Handmade in the USA
